return.minion1:
Passed invalid arguments to locate.locate: locate() takes at least 1 argument (0 given)

    Performs a file lookup. Valid options (and their defaults) are::

        basename=False
        count=False
        existing=False
        follow=True
        ignore=False
        nofollow=False
        wholename=True
        regex=False
        database=<locate's default database>
        limit=<integer, not set by default>

    See the manpage for ``locate(1)`` for further explanation of these options.

    CLI Example:

    .. code-block:: bash

        salt '*' locate.locate
